trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of static <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> objects, which is used when the connections are declared in content pages and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control is declared in a master page.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> statici, utilizzato quando le connessioni vengono dichiarate in pagine di contenuto e il controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> viene dichiarato in una pagina master.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used in a specific development scenario.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> classe viene utilizzata in uno scenario di sviluppo specifico.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts application uses master pages, with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control declared in a master page, and individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects declared in content pages as static connections, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used.
trans-unit.target: Se un'applicazione Web part utilizza pagine master, con la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo dichiarato in una pagina master e singoli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetti dichiarati nelle pagine di contenuto come connessioni statiche, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> classe viene utilizzata.

trans-unit.source: In the content pages, multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> controls can be declared, which differs from the ordinary rule that only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can be declared on a page.
trans-unit.target: Nelle pagine di contenuto, più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> controlli possono essere dichiarati, che differisce dalla regola normale di un solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo può essere dichiarato in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control on a content page can contain a `<StaticConnections>` element, and this element can contain one or more declared `<asp:webpartconnection>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> controllo in una pagina di contenuto può contenere un `<StaticConnections>` elemento e questo elemento può contenere uno o più dichiarato `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used by the Web Parts control set to create a collection of all the static connections declared in each content page, and these collections are ultimately added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> classe viene utilizzata dal controllo Web part per creare un insieme di tutte le connessioni statiche dichiarate in ogni pagina contenuto e queste raccolte vengono aggiunti alla fine il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> insieme il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> class is used to create the collection of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> classe viene utilizzata per creare la raccolta di static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetti a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> da aggiungere all'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that indicates where the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> was inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica il punto in cui l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> è stato inserito nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> method to add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects to an existing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> metodo per aggiungere nuovi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetti esistente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> being checked for its existence in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> di cui viene verificata la presenza in un insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se uno specifico oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> è presente nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il parametro <paramref name="value" /> è presente nell'insieme; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object and determine whether it is in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Contains%2A> metodo consente di controllare un determinato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> dell'oggetto e determinare se è presente in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> in cui è contenuto l'insieme copiato.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica il punto di partenza nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire i contenuti dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'insieme in una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to create a custom array to programmatically manipulate a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.CopyTo%2A> metodo è utile quando si desidera creare una matrice personalizzata per modificare a livello di codice un insieme di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> che corrisponde a un membro dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.IndexOf%2A> method is useful when you want to know the ordinal position (index) of one object relative to the others in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.IndexOf%2A> metodo è utile quando si desidera conoscere la posizione ordinale (indice) di un oggetto rispetto agli altri in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the ordinal position in the collection at which a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica la posizione ordinale nell'insieme, in corrispondenza della quale deve venire inserito un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> da inserire nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> nell'insieme, in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è uguale al numero di elementi nella raccolta, quindi `value` viene aggiunto alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> objects can be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se è possibile aggiungere oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> all'insieme.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if connection objects cannot be added to the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se non è possibile aggiungere oggetti connessione all'insieme; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Enables specific connection members to be added to or retrieved from the collection, according to an index or a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Consente di aggiungere a o di recuperare dall'insieme membri della connessione specifici, in base a un indice o a un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica l'indice di un membro dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a connection item within the collection, based on an index number indicating the item's location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un elemento connessione all'interno dell'insieme, in base a un numero di indice indicante la posizione dell'elemento nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> nell'indice specificato nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Item%2A> property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection by using an index number that represents the item's ordinal position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.Item%2A> proprietà consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> insieme con un numero di indice che rappresenta la posizione ordinale nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of a particular connection in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente l'ID di una connessione specifica nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro specifico dell'insieme in base a un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> whose ID matches the value of the <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> il cui ID corrisponde al valore del parametro <paramref name="id" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="null" /> se non viene trovato alcun oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object with the specified ID by performing a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetto con l'ID specificato eseguendo un confronto tra maiuscole e minuscole.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> specificato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetto dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the specified item are then moved up in the collection to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli elementi che seguono l'elemento specificato vengono spostati verso l'alto nella raccolta per riempire la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
